description: The all-in-one solution for your e-commerce data analytics. Start using E-Analistic today and make informed decisions for your business.
configTitle: Sign Up and Configure Your Shopify Store
configDescription: Sign up and enter your store information to get started.
loginDescription: Log in to your account to continue.
heroTitle: Transform Your E-commerce Data Into Concrete Opportunities
heroDescription: With E-Analistic, harness the power of your data to boost your sales, understand your customers, and anticipate trends. Maximize your profitability today.
aboutDescription: E-Analistic is the ultimate platform for online merchants who want to take control of their data. With powerful and intuitive analytics tools, we help you transform numbers into winning strategies.
contactDescription: Do you have questions or need personalized support? Write to us at
featureSalesDescription: Track your sales performance in real-time and identify opportunities to boost your sales.
featureReportsDescription: Generate detailed and customized reports to measure the impact of your actions.
featureForecastsDescription: Anticipate market trends and plan your strategies with AI-based forecasts.
featureInsightsDescription: Discover which products perform best and adjust your marketing campaigns accordingly.
featureShopifyDescription: Connect your Shopify store in a few clicks and access instant insights.
